overview:
John Creason is the chief technology officer of Smartsheet.com where he oversees all software development and hosting operations. In addition, he directs all activities related to the company’s long term technology strategy and software architecture. John is a pioneer in hosted software solutions. John served as director of development at Concur Technologies during the company’s transition from an on-premise software provider to an on-demand business service. Prior to Concur, John served as director of development at Captura Software (later acquired by Concur) where he lead the development of the first fully hosted corporate expense management system. John is an active member of the Open Web Application Security Project (OWASP) community and recently agreed to chair a task force on AJAX security.

Source : SmartSheet.com
